Reviews.Title: “Great Location and Service”

Reviews.Content: comfortable bed ive slept location ideal french quarter booked deluxe king size clean placed hallway near staff office awoken mornings 7am outside door amazed morning people obviously sleeping service exceptional enjoyed free breakfast croissants eggs grits bacon juice toast yogurts dont forget stop patricks bar vin wine bar speak angela bartender helpful giving orleans recommendations
